mapper.select: SELECT MNO, EMAIL, MNAME, CRE_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, M.MNO, M.EMAIL, M.MNAME, M.CRE_DATE FROM ( SELECT MNO, EMAIL, MNAME, CRE_DATE FROM MEMBER ORDER BY MNO DESC) M ) MEMBER WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUE(MNO , EMAIL, PWD, MNAME , CRE_DATE, MOD_DATE) VALUES(MEMBER_MNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{email}, #{password}, #{name} , SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
